frontmatter.title: Gaussian Integral
frontmatter.description: The Gaussian integral, also known as the Euler–Poisson integral, is the integral of the Gaussian function {\displaystyle f(x)=e^{-x^{2}}} over the entire real line.

frontmatter.title: Data structure of Pascal's triangle
frontmatter.description: Pascal's triangle is a triangular array of the binomial coefficients that arises in probability theory, combinatorics, and algebra.
